  <script>
   function _getUrlParameter (name) {
            name = name.replace(/[\[]/, '\\[').replace(/[\]]/, '\\]');
            var regex = new RegExp('[\\?&]' + name + '=([^&#]*)');
            var results = regex.exec(location.search);
            return results === null ? '' : decodeURIComponent(results[1].replace(/\+/g, ' '));
        }

        if(location && location.pathname && location.pathname.indexOf('itinerary') > -1){
            var titleTag = "";
            if(document.getElementsByTagName("title")){
                titleTag = document.getElementsByTagName("title");
            }
            if(_getUrlParameter('isBookingFlow') == 1 && titleTag){
                titleTag[0].text = "Flight Itinerary";
            }else{
                titleTag[0].text = "Modify Itinerary";
            }
        }
  </script>

    Flickerlessly.onReady(
        {
            selector: ".ttTopWrap",
            persist: true,
            success: function (el) {

                var buttonTest = document.querySelector('.facelift-bw-card-view .new-bwContainer--main .search_flight_container .trip-tab-content--right .ig-search-btn-container .ig-search-btn');

                if (buttonTest != null) {

                    buttonTest.addEventListener('click', function () {
                        var flightroute = document.querySelector('.btn.dropdown-toggle.btn-light').title;

                        if (flightroute == 'One Way') {
                            console.log('Hi');
                            adobe.target.getOffer({
                                "mbox": "mboxFlightRoute",
                                "params": {
                                    "profile.flightroute": "oneway"
                                },
                                "success": function (offer) {
                                    adobe.target.applyOffer({
                                        "mbox": "mboxFlightRoute",
                                        "offer": offer
                                    });
                                },
                                "error": function (status, error) {
                                    console.log('Error', status, error);
                                }
                            });
                        }

                        var specialFare = document.querySelector('.facelift-bw-card-view .new-bwContainer--main .search_flight_container .trip-tab-content .fareWrap ul li.selected');

                        if (specialFare) {


                            adobe.target.getOffer({
                                "mbox": "mboxSpecialFareType",
                                "params": {
                                    "profile.specialfaretype": specialFare.innerText,
                                },
                                "success": function (offer) {
                                    adobe.target.applyOffer({
                                        "mbox": "mboxSpecialFareType",
                                        "offer": offer
                                    });
                                },
                                "error": function (status, error) {
                                    console.log('Error', status, error);
                                }
                            });

                        }

                        var srCitizen = document.querySelectorAll('.passengers-list li .no-of-counts .counter')[1];

                        if (srCitizen) {
                            adobe.target.getOffer({
                                "mbox": "mboxSpecialFareType",
                                "params": {
                                    "profile.srCitizen": srCitizen.value,
                                },
                                "success": function (offer) {
                                    adobe.target.applyOffer({
                                        "mbox": "mboxSpecialFareType",
                                        "offer": offer
                                    });
                                },
                                "error": function (status, error) {
                                    console.log('Error', status, error);
                                }
                            });
                        }
                    })


                }




            }

        },
        {
            selector: "#bookFlightTab",
            persist: true,
            success: function (el) {

                if (window.innerWidth < 768) {

                    var button1 = document.querySelector('.facelift-bw-card-view .new-bwContainer--main .search_flight_container .trip-tab-content--right .ig-search-btn-container .ig-search-btn');

                    var button2 = document.querySelector("#bookFlightTab > form > div.row.wrap-discount.special-fare-container > div.col-md-5.col-12.padd-right.ml-auto > button");

                    if (button1 != null) {
                        button1.addEventListener('click', function () {

                            if (flightroute == 'One Way') {
                                adobe.target.getOffer({

                                    },

                                });
                            }

                            var specialFare = document.querySelector('.facelift-bw-card-view .new-bwContainer--main .search_flight_container .trip-tab-content .fareWrap ul li.selected');

                            if (specialFare) {


                                adobe.target.getOffer({
                                    "mbox": "mboxSpecialFareType",
                                    "params": {
                                        "profile.specialfaretype": specialFare.innerText,
                                    },
                                    "success": function (offer) {
                                        adobe.target.applyOffer({
                                            "mbox": "mboxSpecialFareType",
                                            "offer": offer
                                        });
                                    },
                                    "error": function (status, error) {
                                        console.log('Error', status, error);
                                    }
                                });

                            }

                            var srCitizen = document.querySelectorAll('.passengers-list li .no-of-counts .counter')[1];

                            if (srCitizen) {
                                adobe.target.getOffer({
                                    "mbox": "mboxSpecialFareType",
                                    "params": {
                                        "profile.srCitizen": srCitizen.value,
                                    },
                                    "success": function (offer) {
                                        adobe.target.applyOffer({
                                            "mbox": "mboxSpecialFareType",
                                            "offer": offer
                                        });
                                    },
                                    "error": function (status, error) {
                                        console.log('Error', status, error);
                                    }
                                });
                            }
                        })
                    }

                    if (button2 != null) {

                        button2.addEventListener('click', function () {
                            var flightroute = document.querySelector('label.new_radio input[type=radio]:checked+label').innerText;

                            if (flightroute == 'One Way') {
                                adobe.target.getOffer({
                                    "mbox": "mboxFlightRoute",
                                    "params": {
                                        "profile.flightroute": "oneway"
                                    },
                                    "success": function (offer) {

                                        });
                                    },

    Flickerlessly.onReady(
        {
            selector: ".booking-section",
            persist: true,
            success: function (el) {

                var buttonOnSRP = document.querySelector(".widget-modify__container__modifyCTA .custom-button");

                if (buttonOnSRP != null) {
                    document.querySelector(".widget-modify__container__modifyCTA .custom-button").addEventListener('click', function () {

                        setTimeout(function () {
                            var journeySource = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('bw_cntxt_val'));

                            var journeySourceValue = journeySource.selectedSourceCityInfo.isInternational;

                            var journeyDestination = journeySource.selectedDestinationCityInfo.isInternational;

                            if (journeySourceValue && journeyDestination) {
                                const params = {
                                    "isInternationalSource": 'true',
                                    "isInternationalDestination": 'true'
                                }
                                InternationalFlights(params);


                            }
                            else if (journeySourceValue && !journeyDestination) {
                                const params = {
                                    "isInternationalSource": 'true',
                                    "isInternationalDestination": 'false'
                                }
                                InternationalFlights(params);


                            }
                            else if (!journeySourceValue && journeyDestination) {
                                const params = {
                                    "isInternationalSource": 'false',
                                    "isInternationalDestination": 'true'
                                }
                                InternationalFlights(params);


                            }
                            else if (!journeySourceValue && !journeyDestination) {
                                // InternationalFlights('false');
                                const params = {
                                    "isInternationalSource": 'false',
                                    "isInternationalDestination": 'false'
                                }
                                InternationalFlights(params);
                            }

                            var multicity = document.querySelector("#container-23d5c8e597 > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > section > div > div > div > div.widget-modify__container__journeyType > div > button").innerText;

                            if (multicity.includes('Multi City')) {

                                setTimeout(function () {
                                    const multiCity = journeySource.selectedMultiCityInfo;
                                    var isInternationalTrip = false;
                                    multiCity.forEach(function (city) {
                                        if (city.from.isInternational || city.to.isInternational) {
                                            isInternationalTrip = true;
                                            return;
                                        }
                                    });

                                    console.log(isInternationalTrip);

                                    const params = {
                                        "profile.isInternationalMultiCity": isInternationalTrip.toString(),
                                    }
                                    InternationalFlights(params);

                                }, 100)
                            }

                            function InternationalFlights(params) {
                                adobe.target.getOffer({
                                    "mbox": "mboxJourneyValues",
                                    "params": params,
                                    "success": function (offer) {
                                        adobe.target.applyOffer({
                                            "mbox": "mboxJourneyValues",
                                            "offer": offer
                                        });
                                    },
                                    "error": function (status, error) {
                                        console.log('Error', status, error);
                                    }
                                });
                            }



                        }, 0)

                    })
                }




            }

        }

    );
  </script>

  <script>
   //Define function to set event with/without Data Element value

function setAAEvent(eNum,de) {
  try{
    //check if event was received
    if(typeof eNum != "undefined"){
      //check if data element was received and not empty
      if(typeof de != "undefined" && typeof _satellite.getVar(de)!="undefined" && _satellite.getVar(de)!="")
        s.events = s.apl(s.events, eNum +"="+ _satellite.getVar(de));
      //check if data element was not received
      else if(typeof de == "undefined") s.events = s.apl(s.events, eNum);
    
      //set event in linktrackEvents & linkTrackVars
      s.linkTrackEvents = s.apl(s.linkTrackEvents, eNum);
      s.linkTrackVars = s.apl(s.linkTrackVars, "events");
    }
  }
  catch(e){}
}
  </script>
  <script>
   /*

  function marketType(){
  var x = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('enresponse')).markets;
  var internationalAirportCode = []; //new array to store international airports
  
  //filter international airports from the list 
  x.filter(function(obj) {
    if (obj.market === 'International') {
      internationalAirportCode.push(obj.airportCode);
    }
  })
  
  //if user searched airport exist in filtered list then set international else domestic
  return (internationalAirportCode.indexOf(_satellite.getVar("DepartingCity")) !== -1 || internationalAirportCode.indexOf(_satellite.getVar("Destination City")) !== -1) ? 'international' : 'domestic';
}

  <script>
   //if cid param is present set the value to aff30min cookie
//if cid param is not present and aff30min cookie is present, resent expiration time for aff30min by 30 minutes

function aff30minCookie(){
  try{
    
    var inThirtyMinutes = new Date(new Date().getTime() + (30*60*1000));
    var ecmp = _satellite.getVar("external campaign");
    var campaignid = ecmp.split("-")[0];
    var clickid = s.Util.getQueryParam("wego_click_id");
    
    //Set aff30min cookie (For Affiliates: Wego)
    if(ecmp.search('wego')!=-1)
      _satellite.cookie.set('wegocookie', campaignid+"_"+clickid, { expires: inThirtyMinutes });
    
    //Set aff30min cookie (For affiliates: JetRadar)
    else if(_satellite.getVar("external campaign")!="" && _satellite.getVar("external campaign")!=undefined)
      _satellite.cookie.set('aff30min', _satellite.getVar("external campaign"), { expires: inThirtyMinutes });
    
    
    //Reset the expiration time to next 30 minutes
    else if(_satellite.cookie.get("aff30min")!="" && typeof _satellite.cookie.get("aff30min")!="undefined")
      _satellite.cookie.set('aff30min', _satellite.cookie.get("aff30min"), { expires: inThirtyMinutes });

  }catch(e){}
}
  </script>

               <div class="text aem-GridColumn--default--none aem-GridColumn aem-GridColumn--default--12 aem-GridColumn--offset--default--0">
                <div class="cmp-text" id="text-f56f6c6314">
                 <h2>
                  Booking flights with IndiGo
                 </h2>
                 <p>
                  India's largest and leading passenger airline - IndiGo strives to offer the lowest airfare for your flight booking. Over the years, IndiGo has become synonymous with on-time travel and with every flight ticket you book on the website, we strive to deliver a hassle-free experience to you. With an expanding network and fleet, IndiGo operates to connect you to the people and places you love.
                 </p>
                 <p>
                  IndiGo currently has flights to over 80+ domestic
                  <a href="/indian-destinations.html">
                   destinations in India
                  </a>
                  and 30+
                  <a href="/international-destinations.html">
                   international destinations
                  </a>
                  . The smaller regions of India are connected with our fleet of ATRs, the larger cities with the A320 CEO, A320 NEO and A321 NEO aircraft, etc and some of the international destinations are operated under codeshare partnerships. So, book directly from our website or mobile app for a personalised experience and get ready to enjoy an array of benefits with IndiGo.
                 </p>
                </div>
               </div>
               <div class="text aem-GridColumn aem-GridColumn--default--12">
                <div class="cmp-text" id="text-8121709740">

               <div class="text aem-GridColumn aem-GridColumn--default--12">
                <div class="cmp-text" id="text-c0071978c5">
                 <h2 style="line-height: 30.0px;">
                  6E Eats - Add your favourite snack and beverage on your next flight booking
                 </h2>
                 <p>
                  Pre-book your meal from our specially curated menu consisting of IndiGo Classics, 6E choice of the day, and #IndiaByIndiGo regional favourites. The revamped in-flight food offering sets a new standard for customer experience that ensures quicker on-board service, greater customer engagement, and reduced food wastage.
                 </p>
                </div>
               </div>
               <div class="text aem-GridColumn aem-GridColumn--default--12">
                <div class="cmp-text" id="text-d1eedc791e">
                 <h2>
                  Book affordable air tickets with IndiGo
                 </h2>
                 <p>
                  <b>
                   6Exclusive:
                  </b>
                  Save more, travel more with our newly launched
                  <a href="https://www.goindigo.in/add-on-services/6exclusive-fare.html">
                   6Exclusive Fare
                  </a>
                  . Get up to 10% off when you book flights on IndiGo’s web and app with this fare. The discount is applicable on bookings made at least 3 days prior to the date of travel.
                 </p>
                 <p>
                  Finding cheap flight tickets means using the saved money for a more elaborate holiday with an opportunity to indulge in more local experiences and shopping. Isn’t it? So, it is best that you plan your travel in advance and directly book through
                  <a adhocenable="false" href="https://www.goindigo.in/">
                   goIndiGo.in
                  </a>
                  , to enjoy the perks of getting the best deal along with several other benefits.
                 </p>
                 <p>
                  You can also keep a track of the IndiGo airfare calendar, keep an eye on the
                  <a href="/campaigns/indigo-offers.html">
                   offers page
                  </a>
                  on our website and also our social media page for announcements on sale offers. IndiGo offers special fares during its sale period for domestic flights as well as international flights, making it an excellent time to book your flight tickets. In addition, the cashback offers are sure to delight you with additional savings on your airfare.
                 </p>
                 <p>
                  So, any time you plan a travel, book directly from the IndiGo website or mobile app and be delighted with the cheapest airfares.
                 </p>
                 <h2>
                  How can you book IndiGo flight tickets?
                 </h2>
                 <p>
                  <b>
                   Here are easy steps to book IndiGo flight tickets.
                  </b>
                 </p>
                 <div class="about-service">
                  <ol>
                   <li>
                    First, go to the
                    <a adhocenable="false" href="https://www.goindigo.in/">
                     goIndiGo.in
                    </a>
                    website or open the IndiGo mobile app.
                   </li>
                   <li>
                    Then, visit the booking page and enter the ‘to’ and ‘from’ destinations.
                   </li>
                   <li>
                    Choose the date of travel and number of passengers.
                   </li>
                   <li>
                    In case you are eligible for a special fare, please select from – 6Exclusive, Armed Forces, Student, Senior Citizen, LTC, Family &amp; Friends and Unaccompanied Minor.
                   </li>
                   <li>
                    Click on the ‘Search Flight’ button to receive a list of options along with the flight ticket prices. Choose the flight as per your preference.
                   </li>
                   <li>
                    Confirm your booking after entering all the required details and get ready to enjoy on-time, hassle-free and courteous service on board.
                   </li>
                  </ol>
                 </div>
                 <p>
                  <b>
                   <i>
                    Note
                   </i>
                  </b>
                  : While making the payment for your flight tickets, do check out the various cashback and other deals available on the
                  <a href="/campaigns/indigo-offers.html">
                   offers page
                  </a>
                  . This will enable you to enjoy additional savings on your booking.
                 </p>
                 <h2>
                  What are the advantages of booking flights with IndiGo?
                 </h2>
                 <p>
                  Offering cheap flights to a slew of domestic and international destinations, IndiGo aims at connecting different destinations by offering over 2000 flights every day. At IndiGo, we prioritize the comfort of our customers above everything else. In accordance with the same, we at IndiGo offer multiple additional benefits on direct booking along with hassle-free and courteous airport and
                  <a href="/add-on-services.html">
                   in-flight services
                  </a>
                  .
                 </p>
                 <p>
                  <b>
                   Listed below are some of the benefits of booking air tickets with IndiGo:
                  </b>
                 </p>
                 <div class="about-service">
                  <ol>
                   <li>
                    IndiGo offers the lowest flight booking fees, EMI options, and many other booking perks.
                   </li>
                   <li>
                    With IndiGo, you can cancel your flight tickets at lower fee.
                   </li>
                   <li>
                    Passengers can choose from different types of fare such as Saver, Flexi Plus, Super 6E Fares and others for additional savings.
                   </li>
                   <li>
                    Get additional discounts when you book with categories such as Unaccompanied Minor, Armed Forces, Students, LTC.
                   </li>
                   <li>
                    Offers multiple payment options to choose from, such as UPI, NetBanking, etc.
                   </li>
                   <li>
                    6E Eats and onboard has to be on-board.
                   </li>
                   <li>
                    Opt for Seat Select and choose a preferable window seat or extra legroom at the time of booking.
                   </li>
                   <li>
                    IndiGo provides a Delayed &amp; Lost Baggage Protection add-on at the time of booking, which assures compensation in the event your check-in bags are delayed, lost, or damaged due to any unforeseen circumstance.
                   </li>
                   <li>
                    In addition, IndiGo also offers an array of add-ons such as 6E Prime, Fast Forward, Lounge Services etc.
                   </li>
                   <li>
                    With our AI-powered chat assistant, 6E skai you can sort all of your booking queries. You can also get booking-related notifications and answers to your queries on your favourite messaging app, WhatsApp.
                   </li>
                  </ol>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
               <div class="text aem-GridColumn aem-GridColumn--default--12">
                <div class="cmp-text" id="text-20855c5da9">
                 <h2>
                  IndiGo flights to domestic and International destinations
                 </h2>
                 <p>
                  India's coolest and largest passenger airline, IndiGo dominates the country's
                  <a href="/domestic-flights.html">
                   domestic flights
                  </a>
                  space as a low-cost carrier. IndiGo has its reach over 80+ destinations across India with its direct and connecting flights. IndiGo strives to improve domestic connectivity in every possible way regardless of where you choose to visit within India, whether it is in the buzzing metropolises like Delhi, Kolkata, Mumbai, or the tier-II cities like Kadapa, Darbhanga, and others.
                 </p>
                 <p>
                  Your travel options are not only limited to domestic sectors but also international ones. With
                  <a href="/international-flights.html">
                   affordable international fares
                  </a>
                  , IndiGo will be happy to fly you first to your first International destination with its convenient direct and connecting flights from key destinations in India and abroad. IndiGo currently operates to over 30+ international destinations.
                 </p>
                </div>
               </div>

                          Flights to Kurnool
                         </a>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                         <a href="/domestic-flights/flights-to-bareilly.html?linkNav=Flights%20to%20Bareilly%7CDomestic%20Flights%7CIndiGo%20Destinations">
                          Flights to Bareilly
                         </a>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                         <a href="/domestic-flights/flights-to-rajkot.html?linkNav=Flights%20to%20Rajkot%7CDomestic%20Flights%7CIndiGo%20Destinations">
                          Flights to Rajkot
                         </a>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                         <a href="/domestic-flights/flights-to-durgapur.html?linkNav=Flights%20to%20Durgapur%7CDomestic%20Flights%7CIndiGo%20Destinations">
                          Flights to Durgapur
                         </a>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                         <a href="/domestic-flights/flights-to-darbhanga.html?linkNav=Flights%20to%20Darbhanga%7CDomestic%20Flights%7CIndiGo%20Destinations">
                          Flights to Darbhanga
                         </a>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                         <a href="/domestic-flights/flights-to-gwalior.html?linkNav=Flights%20to%20Gwalior%7CDomestic%20Flights%7CIndiGo%20Destinations">
                          Flights to Gwalior
                         </a>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                         <a href="/domestic-flights/flights-to-kanpur.html?linkNav=Flights%20to%20Kanpur%7CDomestic%20Flights%7CIndiGo%20Destinations">
                          Flights to Kanpur
                         </a>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                         <a href="/domestic-flights/flights-to-kadapa.html?linkNav=Flights%20to%20Kadapa%7CDomestic%20Flights%7CIndiGo%20Destinations">
                          Flights to Kadapa
                         </a>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                         <a href="/domestic-flights/flights-to-pantnagar.html?linkNav=Flights%20to%20Pantnagar%7CDomestic%20Flights%7CIndiGo%20Destinations">
                          Flights to Pantnagar
                         </a>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                         <a href="/domestic-flights/flights-to-deoghar.html?linkNav=Flights%20to%20Deoghar%7CDomestic%20Flights%7CIndiGo%20Destinations">
                          Flights to Deoghar
                         </a>
                        </li>
                       </ul>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
               <div class="text aem-GridColumn aem-GridColumn--default--12">
                <div class="cmp-text" id="text-5edd60104c">
                 <p>
                  IndiGo has also entered into a
                  <a href="/codeshare.html">
                   codeshare agreement
                  </a>
                  which has further expanded our footprints into Europe and other parts of the world. IndiGo operates direct flights to Istanbul and beyond. The connections beyond Istanbul are served by Turkish Airlines and can be booked on the IndiGo website, providing you with a comprehensive experience.
                 </p>
                 <p>
                  Moreover, in case you require special assistance, you can request for the same while making a booking or get in touch with our customer service representative or airport staff later. We will do everything to ensure you have a comfortable flight to your destination. Our staff will be happy to assist you with anything you should require for your journey. Also, if you need to plan your itinerary, you can also take recommendations from our destination and airport pages which have all the information on everything you need to know to plan your trip - places to visit, the best time to travel, flight details, places to eat, shopping, and airport information.
                 </p>
                 <p>
                  So, book your next trip with IndiGo and get ready for a great customer experience at all points of your journey.
                 </p>
                 <p>
                 </p>
                </div>
               </div>

               <div class="text aem-GridColumn aem-GridColumn--default--12">
                <div class="cmp-text" id="faq-rte">
                 <div class="container container-mob">
                  <div class="col-lg-12">
                   <h2 class="ig-common-head">
                    Frequently asked questions
                   </h2>
                   <div class="desti-service">
                    <div class="question-block empty">
                     <h6>
                      <p>
                       Where can I find flight booking offers from IndiGo?
                      </p>
                     </h6>
                     <div>
                      <div>
                       <p>
                        If you book directly on
                        <a href="https://www.goindigo.in/">
                         goIndiGo.in
                        </a>
                        or the IndiGo mobile app, you can check out the
                        <a adhocenable="false" href="/campaigns/indigo-offers.html">
                         Offers page
                        </a>
                        for a cashback or discount on your booking. You may also keep a look out on IndiGo’s email, SMS and social media communication for the same.
                       </p>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="question-block empty">
                     <h6>
                      <p>
                       Are there any benefits to booking directly with IndiGo?
                      </p>
                     </h6>
                     <div>
                      <div>
                       <p>
                        Yes. Booking directly through the website or the mobile app lets you enjoy additional benefits such as
                        <a adhocenable="false" href="/add-on-services.html">
                         6E Add-ons
                        </a>
                        , the latest Offers and sale alerts.
                       </p>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="question-block empty">
                     <h6>
                      <p>
                       How can I book a charter flight with IndiGo?
                      </p>
                     </h6>
                     <div>
                      <div>
                       <p>
                        You may book a charter flight to suit your special travel needs by filling up a form, post which one of our representatives would contact you for further assistance.
                        <a adhocenable="false" href="/charters.html">
                         Find charter flight related details here
                        </a>
                        .
                       </p>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="question-block empty">
                     <h6>
                      <p>
                       How will I be alerted about the next IndiGo’s sale?
                      </p>
                     </h6>
                     <div>
                      <div>
                       <p>
                        Having the IndiGo mobile app downloaded is the quickest way to stay ahead on
                        <a adhocenable="false" href="/sale.html">
                         IndiGo’s sale
                        </a>
                        through app notifications, besides checking the website and social media channels.
                       </p>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="question-block empty">
                     <h6>
                      <p>
                       How do I reschedule or cancel my booking?
                      </p>
                     </h6>
                     <div>
                      <div>
                       <p>
                        You may go to
                        <a adhocenable="false" href="/edit-booking.html">
                         View/Edit Booking
                        </a>
                        to make changes to your existing booking using your PNR.
                       </p>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="question-block empty">
                     <h6>
                      <p>
                       Will I get a refund if I wish to cancel my booking?
                      </p>
                     </h6>
                     <div>
                      <div>
                       <p>
                        Depending on the number of days left for departure, you will be charged a cancellation fee for your booking. To know the exact details, visit
                        <a adhocenable="false" href="/travel-information/en/refunds.html">
                         refunds FAQs page
                        </a>
                        .
                       </p>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="question-block empty">
                     <h6>
                      <p>
                       How do I find out the status of my flight?
                      </p>
                     </h6>
                     <div>
                      <div>
                       <p>
                        Got to the
                        <a adhocenable="false" href="/check-flight-status.html">
                         Flight Status
                        </a>
                        tab, enter your route details, flight details and PNR/Booking Reference ID. Your flight’s status will be available to view.
                       </p>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="question-block empty">
                     <h6>
                      <p>
                       How will I be notified if my flight gets delayed?
                      </p>
                     </h6>
                     <div>
                      <div>
                       <p>
                        In case of any changes to your flight’s schedule, you will be notified via SMS and email on the contact information provided by you at the time of booking. It is therefore, imperative to ensure your contact number and email ID is correct.
                       </p>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="question-block empty">
                     <h6>
                      <p>
                       How can I book two seats for the same passenger on an IndiGo flight?
                      </p>
                     </h6>
                     <div>
                      <div>
                       <p>
                        6E Double Seat is our newest addition that lets you
                        <a adhocenable="false" href="/information/6e-double-seat.html">
                         book two seats for a passenger
                        </a>
                        , so you can have more space and less worry about social distancing on the flight.
                       </p>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="question-block empty">
                     <h6>
                      <p>
                       Is there any way I can opt for more baggage?
                      </p>
                     </h6>
                     <div>
                      <div>
                       <p>
                        Yes, you can choose
                        <a adhocenable="false" href="/add-on-services/excess-baggage.html">
                         Excess Baggage
                        </a>
                        service to pre-book extra baggage allowance. You may do this for up to 2 hours and 24 hours before your domestic and international flight booking respectively.
                       </p>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="question-block empty">
                     <h6>
                      <p>
                       Are inflight meals included in the ticket?
                      </p>
                     </h6>
                     <div>
                      <p>
                       6E Eats and inflight has to be in-flight.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="question-block empty">
                     <h6>
                      <p>
                       Is smoking allowed on IndiGo flights?
                      </p>
                     </h6>
                     <div>
                      <div>
                       <p>
                        No. Smoking is strictly prohibited across all IndiGo flights.
                       </p>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="indigostats bg-white aem-GridColumn--default--none aem-GridColumn aem-GridColumn--default--12 aem-GridColumn--offset--default--0">

              <div class="d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center">

   (function(winObj){
            if (window.top.location.href.indexOf('/editor.html') == -1) {
